response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is priced at $950,000. Our aim is to ensure that this transaction not only benefits us financially but also aligns with your vision and goals. We believe that together, we can create a mutually beneficial relationship that fosters growth and success. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
